title: Global youth unemployment rate until 2019
summary: Overall Youth unemployment rate has increased over the Year.

Youth unemployment rate is slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2011, gradually increasing from 2011 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Youth unemployment rate, about 13.2 was reported at Year 2016,  2017, and 2018
Minimum Youth unemployment rate about 12.8 was reached at Year 2011
min_summary: In general Youth unemployment rate has stayed the same over the Year.

Youth unemployment rate is slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2011, gradually increasing from 2011 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
